short.zh_CN: 优化浏览：文字缩放以提高可读性，无干扰阅读模式，隐藏图片以加快加载速度。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make browsing easier and more comfortable with these features:

🔍 Text Zoom: Adjust text size for better readability.
📖 Reader Mode: Switch to a distraction-free reading experience.
🌙 Dark Mode: Protect your eyes with a night-friendly dark theme.
🖼️ Hide Images: Speed up loading by hiding images.

Tailor your browser for comfort and efficiency with our simple, intuitive extension.
